channel.title: Some few Server Questions
channel.description:
Hello, I wanted to ask you, what's best to use to run a Server? Please pick one of the following:
[b]1 -MySQL 2 - Java Runtime Environment (Jre) 3 - Java Development Kit (JDK) [/b]
Which one of the above ^^ is the best to use to run a server? Thanks, ~ Much appreciated.

item.title: Some few Server Questions
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

#1 MySQL doesnt run a server mysql is for if you wanted to create a highscore for your server etc…

For 2 and 3

You need JDK for coding things on the server to compile and etc… you need java for your client to run.

So i dont know what you mean what is best to run a server

Read full topic
